comparison.description: How the health of the entity should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the health of the entity should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value the health should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value the health should be compared to.

type.description:
## Health

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/health)

Checks the current (and absolute) health value of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:health`




---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:health",
    "comparison": "<",
    "compare_to": 20
}
```

This example will check if the entity's health is less than 10 hearts (or 20 health points).
